The **PPG Taxonomic Database Viewer** is a web-app that can be used to browse the current PPG data (@fig-viewer).

[Click here](https://pteridogroup.shinyapps.io/shinyppg/){target="_blank"} to open the app.

Please note that the server has extremely limited bandwidth and may be slow or inaccessible.

![Screenshot of the PPG Taxonomic Database Viewer.](images/data-viewer.png){#fig-viewer}
